cases.title: Group Filter: Load only users that are in a specific group.

steps.action: Go to apache > New Entry > GroupofNames
steps.expected_result: a new group is going to be created

steps.action: Add a member to the group
Go to Rocket.chat > workspace > settings > ldap > User search > Group Filter click enable
On Group ObjectClass fill with groupOfNames
on Group Member Attribute fill with member
on Group Group Member Format fill with uid=#{username},ou=users,dc=rcldap,dc=com,dc=br

steps.expected_result: Only the members of the group should be on the list.

cases.title: Sync users from oAuth with LDAP

steps.action: Enable "Background Sync Update Existing Users" setting
On another browser window, login for the first time with an user via OAuth
On the LDAP, change the information from the user
steps.data: e.g: Change the name and the avatar

steps.action: Validate the information from the oAuth User
steps.expected_result: The name and avatar should be updated to match with LDAP

steps.action: Enable the toggle "Manually enable new users"

steps.expected_result: Goes to the page create users
A toast is gonna appear "Before you can log in, your account must be manually activated by an administrator"

steps.action: On the login page, fill the username and Password with the user that you just create
steps.expected_result: A message is gonna appear "Before you can login, your account must be manually activated by an administrator"

steps.action: Find the user that you just create and click
steps.expected_result: A side menu is going to show

steps.action: Click on the three dots and then click in Activate
steps.expected_result: The status of user is gonna change from diable to offline

steps.action: Try again login with the user that you created
steps.expected_result: is redirect to the home page.

cases.title: Validate auto cleanup functionality on OEmbed cache

steps.action: Send some messages containing links with previews
Set the Embed Cache Expiration Days setting to a specific value (e.g., 0 days).
Change the Cron job value in the code
steps.data: The cron job runs everydat at 2:24am (this can be changed in [this line](https://github.com/RocketChat/Rocket.Chat/pull/31336/files#diff-21161a95fbf3394faa4f2af4add5e90d8eeeb279694d3107c86f834c41059e99R6) for test purposes -- use it as `* * * * *` to run every minute, for example).

steps.action: Wait the time set for the cron job to run
steps.expected_result: A cron job to erase all OEmbed cache registries older than `Embed Cache Expiration` days should be erased from the database (there should be no document in the `rocketchat_oembed_cache collection` with an `updatedAt` field older than defined in the setting).

suites.title: Messages
suites.description: General Test Cases for using the message composer and dealing with messages in the chat of a channel

cases.title: Attachment description and attachment preview size
cases.description: In this task fixed the bug where the attachment description would break to match the preview attachment size. In this test case, we want to make sure the attachment is not breaking regardless of the room type.
cases.preconditions: * You need to have an image file in your computer

steps.action: Open the room and on the message composer, click on “+” → “Computer”
Select an image from your computer
Add the file description as a long text
steps.data: You can use the text generated by this website: https://www.lipsum.com/

steps.expected_result: The text should fill in the screen and not break lines before it
